column4: Why does Ubuntu lag on vmware, I have 1GB of RAM / nVidia G-force 6800 any idea?
I gave it 800MB ram >.>
I have a 2.49GHz - P4
like If I open multi stuff, like Firefox, Konversation, and skype it lags when you open things, also minimizing things are slow.
One more question, could anyone help me compile/install realvnc, It saids Im missing libs ( I'm new too *nix )
install using synaptic, no need to compile
o.o
any guide to that?
just run synaptic, use the search function, type in vnc.  It will show you the available vnc packages
using sudo?  sudo iwconfig ............
wireless is ethernet, at least in this case.  wireless extension to ieee ethernet standard.
I imagine everyone
- uhm Whats new in Edgy?
no idea, too new for me to worry about.
unanswerable, really
osx has some very nice features, but I'm concerned about it's stability
because the value of various features is very subjective
not a question of the number of features, in fact, linux has more features than osx
well, that's not really true, since you can run KDE and gnome under osx

osx has a very nice feature that shrinks all the windows down to the point where you can see them all on the screen at once.  Some people say they don't want to live without it.  Other people say they never even use it.
I'm not a gamer.  that's a good example; for me, gaming is not an issue.  I know that for many people it's important.
well, to be fair, linux isn't responsible for that, the wireless protocol is.
but it's true that if it were poorly done, linux could screw it up, and it isn't screwed up  :)
